subject: p18512911
History: A-year-old man with atrial fibrillation. Please evaluate for pneumonia.
Findings: There is moderate cardiomegaly, but no pulmonary edema. There is no pleural effusion and no pneumothorax. There is a plate-like lingular atelectasis.
Impression: Moderate cardiomegaly, but no pulmonary edema. No pneumonia.
